thread.title: California's sweeping new social policies could set trend
thread.title_full: California's sweeping new social policies could set trend

title: California's sweeping new social policies could set trend
text: > Top News California's sweeping new social policies could set trend FILE - In this Feb. 4, 2015, file photo, state Sen. Richard Pan, D-Sacramento, center, accompanied co-author Ben Allen, D-Santa Monica, background, and concerned mothers and their children, answers a question about their proposed legislation requiring parents to vaccinate all school children, during a news conference in Sacramento, Calif. California enacted some of the nation's most aggressive social polices this year, including Pan and Allen's SB277 the bill requiring parents to vaccinate school children. (AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli, File)
